# Setup

```{r}
data(mtcars)
library(easystats)
library(tidyverse)
```


# First model

<https://stats-nutshell.netlify.app/050-regression1#first-model-one-metric-predictor>

```{r}
lm1_freq <- lm(mpg ~ hp, data = mtcars)
```


Extract parameters of the model:

```{r}
parameters(lm1_freq)
```
